"synopsis" may belong to another edition of this title. Cecilia Ramrez Harris is the author of the Amazon best seller book El diario de mi detox. An international broadcast journalist specializing in health, well-being and life style issues on the award-winning television news program Primer Impacto on Univision Network. She is also a certified about the latest advances in traditional and alternative medicine, Cecilia uses and education to empower groups and individuals to their maximum personal and professional potential. Cecilia studied journalism at the Universidad Catolica Andrs Bello in her native Venezuela and Clinical Nutrition in The University of Miami. A proud mother of two, she now lives in Miami, Florida.
